author: wn.com
title: Remarks by President Donald Tusk following the tripartite social summit (Council of the European Union) ...
text: ( Source : Council of the European Union ) This morning, we had useful discussions with the social partners on their role in stepping up employment and growth in Europe . The recovery is under way, but Europe continues to pay the social costs
